direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods handle universal transfers between sub-accounts with similar parameter structures and return types.
Both methods query transfer histories, though one is specific to spot transfers and the other is universal.
Both methods involve transfer operations with similar parameter checks and request handling structures.

enhanced_by.reason: Initialization of the request handler is required before any transfer operations.
Environment setup is necessary before querying transfer histories.
Both methods involve verifying transfer statuses and handling similar exceptions.
